quote: INTENT reveals desire; ACTION reveals commitment.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Time bows to authentic commitment, and it stretches to accommodate it.
author: Will Hewett

quote: I think when men hear that women want a commitment, they think it means commitment to a romantic relationship, but that's not it. It's a commitment to not floating around anywhere. I want a guy who is entrenched in his own life.
author: Mindy Kaling,  Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me?

quote: Commitment mixed with drive and sprinkled with imagination creates sustained results. Stay focused and you will make your mark!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: At the moment of commitment the entire universe conspires to assist you.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: When we face pain in relationships our first response is often to sever bonds rather than to maintain commitment.
author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions

quote: Passion is momentary; love is enduring.
author: John Wooden

quote: Do you want to know what one of the secrets to achieving all of your goals is? You’ve got to be committed.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: Love with passion. Love for no reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.
author: Cornel West,  Breaking Bread: Insurgent Black Intellectual Life

quote: You stay safe, You love. You survive. You laugh and cry and struggle and sometimes you fail and sometimes you succeed. You Push.
author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves

quote: I have a loyalty that runs in my bloodstream, when I lock into someone or something, you can't get me away from it because I commit that thoroughly. That's in friendship, that's a deal, that's a commitment. Don't give me paper - I can get the same lawyer who drew it up to break it. But if you shake my hand, that's for life.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
author: Les Brown

quote: What’s the point of being the first to arrive? Nobody is there to witness your commitment.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: When God knows you're ready for the responsibility of commitment, He'll reveal the right person under the right circumstances.
author: Joshua Harris,  I Kissed Dating Goodbye: A New Attitude Toward Relationships and Romance

quote: Relationships are treated like Dixie cups. They are the same. They are disposable. If it does not work, drop it, throw it away, get another.Committed bonds (including marriage) cannot last when this is the prevailing logic. Most of us are unclear about what to do to protect and strengthen caring bonds when our self-centered needs are not being met.
author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions

quote: The secret to living is loving.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I believe that it is impossible for two individuals not committed to their own and each other’s well being to sustain a healthy and enduring relationship.
author: bell hooks,  Breaking Bread: Insurgent Black Intellectual Life

quote: Patience and persistence are the keys... The keys to unlock doors of success... With these two virtues, you grow in reasoning and experience.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Passion is a feeling that tells you: this is the right thing to do. Nothing can stand in my way. It doesn't matter what anyone else says. This feeling is so good that it cannot be ignored. I'm going to follow my bliss and act upon this glorious sensation of joy.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: Passion for knowledge, motivation for continuous learning.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Passion is a deep love for sacred activity.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Promising vs. Promises A promising life comes from a childhood without broken promises.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The only faithfulness people have is to emotions they're trying to recapture
author: Norman Mailer

quote: ...love is the sum of our choices, the strength of our commitments, the ties that bind us together.
author: Emily Giffin,  Love the One You're With

quote: No passion in the world is equal to the passion to alter someone else's draft.
author: H.G. Wells

quote: Marriage is nothing but a commitment to care and share.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
author: Cecil B. DeMille

quote: Be persistent. Success is not far away.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: Being faithful in the smallest things is the way to gain, maintain, and demonstrate the strength needed to accomplish something great.
author: Alex Harris

quote: You have to fight for your marriage, do whatever it takes. The commitment has to be there. And if you don't have a sense of humor, I don't know how anybody makes it.
author: Kay Robertson

quote: Love is the outreach of self toward completion.
author: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved.
author: Wm. Paul Young

quote: Never surrender to you're passions. Dream and live to excess.
author: Truth Devour,  Unrequited

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: Nurturing, Providing, and loving you passionately. May that be, my number of responsibilities. As one to the end, forever more. That's how long I desire, our love to last for. Providing for you many and joyful memories. In hours of darkness, as well as brightness. I plan to supply for you. For your love for me and happiness, is all that matters to me.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable

quote: Passion is what gives meaning to our lives. It's what allows us to achieve success beyond our wildest imagination. Try to find a career path that you have a passion for.
author: Henry Samueli

quote: To sense the peace of extinguished passionHappiness in not knowing the ultimate knowledge
author: Dejan Stojanovic,  The Sign and Its Children

quote: Love is keeping the promise anyway.
author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Fidelity is a living, breathing entity. On wobbly footing, it can wander, becoming something different entirely.
author: Kay Goodstadt,  Love and Death Over Tea

quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli
